trans-unit.source: Translates an object in the three-dimensional x-y-z plane.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.TranslateTransform3D"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.TranslateTransform3D"></xref> class, using the specified offset <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref>.
<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref> by which to offset the model.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.TranslateTransform3D"></xref> class using the specified offset.
Double that specifies the X value of the Vector3D that specifies the translation offset.
Double that specifies the Y value of the Vector3D that specifies the translation offset.
Double that specifies the Z value of the Vector3D that specifies the translation offset.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.TranslateTransform3D"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.
The cloned object's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property will be `false` even if the source's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property was `true.`
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.TranslateTransform3D"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.
The cloned object's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property will be `false` even if the source's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property was `true`.
Gets or sets the X-axis value of the translation's offset.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
Double that represents the X-axis value of the translation's offset.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.TranslateTransform3D.OffsetX"></xref> dependency property.
Gets or sets the Y-axis value of the translation's offset.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
Double that represents the Y-axis value of the translation's offset.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.TranslateTransform3D.OffsetY"></xref> dependency property.
Gets or sets the Z-axis value of the translation's offset.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
Double that represents the Z-axis value of the translation's offset.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.TranslateTransform3D.OffsetZ"></xref> dependency property.
Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> that represents the value of the translation.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> that represents the value of the translation.
